title: NGNLab Alumnus Visit: Dr. Sheeba Backia Mary, Lead Security Architect at Lenovo, Germany
about: On October 21, 2024, NGNLab proudly welcomed its esteemed alumnus, Dr. Sheeba Backia Mary, who currently serves as the Lead Security Architect at Lenovo, Germany. Dr. Sheeba plays a pivotal role in Lenovoâ€™s global telecommunications standardization efforts, with a focus on next-generation networks and security development. She represents both Lenovo and Motorola Mobility in key international bodies, including the 3GPP Security Architecture Working Group (SA WG3) and the ETSI Permissioned Distributed Ledger Working Group (ETSI PDL). During her visit, Dr. Sheeba engaged with NGNLab students, sharing valuable insights and encouraging them to pursue advanced research in 5G and 6G security and standardization efforts.

title: DoT Research Grants for NGNLab to Establish '6G Ubiquitous Connectivity Lab and Cutting-Edge Research'
about: The Department of Telecommunications, India, has sanctioned a three-year research grant for NGNLab to establish the '6G Ubiquitous Connectivity Lab: Advancing India's Health and Agriculture through Innovative Technologies.'
